Dialogue: I'm raising POKEMON too! When they get strong, they can protect me!

Technology is incredible! You can now store and recall items and POKEMON 
 as data via PC!

name: Mother
Dialogue:
Right. All boys leave home some day. It said so on TV. PROF.OAK, next door, 
 is looking for you.

name: SNES
Dialogue: Player is playing the SNES! ...Okay! It's time to go!

name: Television
Dialogue: There's a movie on TV. Four boys are walking on railroad tracks. I better go too.

name: Rival's Sis
Dialogue: Hi Player! Rival is out at Grandpa's lab.

name: Map
Dialogue: It's a big map! This is useful!
I study POKEMON as PROF.OAK'S AIDE.
I study POKEMON as PROF.OAK'S AIDE.
PROF.OAK is the authority on POKEMON! Many POKEMON trainers hold him in high regard!

name: Rival_at_lab
Dialogue: Yo Player! Gramps isn't around!

name: Book
Dialogue: It's encyclopedia-like, but the pages are blank!

name: Computer
Dialogue: There's an e-mail message here! ... Calling all POKEMON trainers! The elite trainers of POKEMON LEAGUE are ready to take on all comers! Bring your best POKEMON and see how you rate as a trainer!

name: Oak
Dialogue: Hey! Wait! Don't go out!
It's unsafe! Wild POKEMON live in tall grass! You need your own POKEMON for your protection. I know! Here, come with me!

name: Rival
Dialogue: Gramps! I'm fed up with waiting!

name: Oak
Dialogue: Rival? Let me think... Oh, that's right, I told you to come! Just wait!
Here, Player! There are 3 POKEMON here! Haha! They are inside the POKE BALLS. When I was young, I was a serious POKEMON trainer. In my old age, I have only 3 left, but you can have one! Choose!

name: Rival
Dialogue: Hey! Gramps! What about me?

name: Oak
Dialogue: Be patient! BLUE, you can have one too!

name: Oak
Dialogue: Now, Player, which POKEMON do you want?

name: Rival
Dialogue: Heh, I don't need to be greedy like you! Go ahead and choose, Player!

name: Oak_attempt_leaving
Dialogue: Oak: Hey! Don't go away yet!

name: Oak
Dialogue: So! You want the <plant/fire/water> POKEMON, <NAME>?
This POKEMON is really energetic!

name: Rival
Dialogue: I'll take this one, then!

name: Oak
Dialogue: If a wild POKEMON appears, your POKEMON can fight against it!

name: Rival
Dialogue: My POKEMON looks a lot stronger.

name: 3rd Ball
Dialogue: That's PROF.OAK's last POKEMON!

name: Rival
Dialogue: Wait Player! Let's check out our POKEMON! Come on, I'll take you on!

name: Rival_leave_lab
Dialogue: Okay! I'll make my POKEMON fight to toughen it up!
Player! Gramps! Smell you later!

name: Oak_regular
Dialogue: Player, raise your young POKEMON by making it fight!

name: Mother2
Dialogue: Player! You should take a quick rest.
Oh good! You and your POKEMON are looking great! Take care now!

name: Getting_pokemon
Dialogue: Rival: Gramps! I'm fed up with waiting!
Oak: Rival? Let me think... Oh, that's right, I told you to come! Just wait!
Oak: Here, Player! There are 3 POKEMON here! Haha! They are inside the POKE BALLS. When I was young, I was a serious POKEMON trainer. In my old age, I have only 3 left, but you can have one! Choose!
Rival: Hey! Gramps! What about me?
Oak: Be patient! Rival, you can have one too!
Oak: Now, Player, which POKEMON do you want?
Rival: Heh, I don't need to be greedy like you! Go ahead and choose, Player!

name: After_getting_pokemon
Dialogue: Rival: I'll take this one, then!
Oak: If a wild POKEMON appears, your POKEMON can fight against it!
Rival: My POKEMON looks a lot stronger.
Rival: Wait Player! Let's check out our POKEMON! Come on, I'll take you on!

name: Oak_parcel
Dialogue:
Oh, Player! How is my old POKEMON? Well, it seems to like you a lot. You must be talented 
 as a POKEMON trainer! What? You have something for me?
Player delivered OAK's PARCEL.
Ah! This is the custom POKE BALL I ordered! Thank you!

name: Getting_pokedex
Dialogue: Rival: Gramps! What did you call me for?

Oak: Oh right! I have a request of you two. On the desk there is my invention, POKEDEX! 
 It automatically records data on POKEMON you've seen or caught! 
 It's a hi-tech encyclopedia!
Player and Rival! Take these with you!

To make a complete guide on all the POKEMON in the world... That was my dream! 
 But, I'm too old! I can't do it! So, I want you two to fulfill my dream for me! 
 Get moving, you two! This is a great undertaking in POKEMON history!

Rival: Alright Gramps! Leave it all to me! Player, I hate to say it, but I don't need you! 
 I know! I'll borrow a TOWN MAP from my sis! 
 I'll tell her not to lend you one, Player! Hahaha!

name: Oak_pokedex
Dialogue: POKEMON around the world wait for you, Player!

name: Rival's Sis 2
Dialogue: Grandpa asked you to run an errand? Here, this will help you!
You have too much stuff with you.

Use the TOWN MAP to find out where you are. 
POKEMON are living things! If they get tired, give them a rest!
